channel.title: Project Help
channel.description: Okay, so I am working on a project that is sorta like the 4chan (Without the adult content) of rsps. And I am having trouble finding a really simple message board script. Can someone please point me in the right direction?

item.title: Project Help
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You should learn PHP as a language for a few weeks and just simply write your own, that would be more beneficial I would think.

http://www.php.net

Read full topic
